localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: 👋 FavEmojis.com is a website that allows you to save Emojis as favorites to have them always handy. Find the Emojis you need and just click to copy and paste them wherever you needed. For example to easy create ads, texts, designs.
blogPost.body: 👋 FavEmojis.com is a website that allows you to save Emojis as favorites to have them always handy. Find the Emojis you need and just click to copy and paste them wherever you needed. For example to easy create ads, texts, designs.
blogPost.title: 👋 FavEmoji – Copy & Paste Emojis - Save Emojis as favorites. Perfect to create ads/text/design.
blogPost.author: freund

localize.description: 👋 FavEmojis.com是一个网站，允许你保存表情符号作为收藏夹，让他们总是方便。找到你需要的Emojis，只需点击复制和粘贴到你需要的地方。例如轻松创建广告、文本、设计。
localize.tagline: 将表情符号保存为收藏夹。完美的创建广告/文本/设计。

localize.description: 👋 FavEmojis.com是一個網站，允許你保存表情符號作爲收藏夾，讓他們總是方便。找到你需要的Emojis，只需點擊複製和粘貼到你需要的地方。例如輕鬆創建廣告、文本、設計。
localize.tagline: 將表情符號保存爲收藏夾。完美的創建廣告/文本/設計。

previous.excerpt: Accurately measure how well your product is satisfying the needs of the modern market + your core power user at every stage of your product lifecycle.
previous.title: Free Product/Market Fit Survey.com - A Free tool to help you build products people want and love

localize.description: 准确衡量你的产品在产品生命周期的每个阶段满足现代市场+你的核心力量用户的需求的程度。
localize.tagline: 一个免费的工具，帮助你打造人们想要和喜爱的产品。

localize.description: 準確衡量你的產品在產品生命週期的每個階段滿足現代市場+你的核心力量用戶的需求的程度。
localize.tagline: 一個免費的工具，幫助你打造人們想要和喜愛的產品。

next.excerpt: Anyone can have great ideas, but not everyone is a designer! Powered by AI, Uizard empowers anyone to easily design interactive web & mobile apps. 🛠 rapid prototyping, 🧠 brainstorming and ideation workshops, ✍️ design sprints, 👔 pitching clients, & more.
next.title: Uizard - The design tool for everyone, powered by AI

localize.description: 任何人都可以有伟大的想法，但不是每个人都是设计师! 在人工智能的支持下，Uizard使任何人都能轻松设计交互式网络和移动应用。🛠快速原型设计、🧠头脑风暴和构思研讨会、✍️设计冲刺、👔推销客户等。
localize.tagline: 每个人的设计工具，由AI驱动

localize.description: 任何人都可以有偉大的想法，但不是每個人都是設計師! 在人工智能的支持下，Uizard使任何人都能輕鬆設計交互式網絡和移動應用。🛠快速原型設計、🧠頭腦風暴和構思研討會、✍️設計衝刺、👔推銷客戶等。
